Summary: Glowing sphere floated directly overhead and away before fading out , twice!
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Cockeysville
There were no other sightings in Cockeysville on or around July 4th 2009
divs: sighting detailswhile waiting to see a fireworks display at a distance of about 1-1.5 miles away at the oregon ridge park , myself and my group of 6 adults 5 children witnessed a glowing orange orb . i noticed it approaching from the southeast at about 1-2 thousand feet in altitude. my first thought was that these were the lights of an approaching helicopter or a small plane, a bright orange round light that apeared to be glowing when directly overhead. the skies were mostly cloudy, so i figured that was why i couldn't see any blinking lights, until it flew silently overhead and had the immediate thought that this was not a plane or helicopter. before it flew directly overhead i announced the strange object to the group, everyone took notice and assumed that it was an aircraft of some kind , but also verbalized that it was odd and silent. i as two others in the group observed it closely as it passed overhead in a sort of wonderment as to what we could be seeing , it kept a steady speed as it moved away to the northwest, the light faded out but the object was still visible for a minute . at this point i and two others of the group were intrigued but resumed our conversations, games w\ kids etc. please note that we were a group of 12 sitting in a grassy knoll at a parking lot , on top of a hill , directly west of interstate i83, there were approx 400 people taking advantage of this vantage point to see a local fireworks display. about 30 minutes later while there was still some light in the sky the object appeared from the same direction and floated overhead as before. upon this second sighting it was clear and evident that this was not a plane or helicopter , just a glowing orange sphere that made no audble noise. as a person who is familiar with the ufo phenomenon, i am extra careful to label something as a ufo , this was so odd that i am perplexed and felt obliged to make a report.
